com.att.aro.bp

Class BestPracticeDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.bp.BestPracticeDisplay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BPAsyncCheckInScript, BPTextFileCompression, DisplayNoneInCSSBestPractice, DuplicateBestPractice, EmptyUrlBestPractice, FileOrderBestPractice, FlashBestPractice, HttpRspCdBestPractice, ImageSizeBestPractice, MinificationBestPractice, Scripts, SpriteImageBestPractice

    public abstract class BestPracticeDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the abstract class for a best practice. Developers may create new ARO best practices by creating classes that extends this class. Because of limited time, note that this was originally an interface, but temporarily changed to an abstract class to make it work with the Text Compression US197546 that requires 3 status (Pass, Fail, Warning). We'll have to refactor later.

    • Method Detail

      • getOverviewTitle

        public abstract java.lang.String getOverviewTitle()
        Returns the title of the best practice displayed in the tests conducted list on the Best Practices page.
        Returns:
        the title string

      • getDetailTitle

        public abstract java.lang.String getDetailTitle()
        Returns the title of the best practice that is displayed in the detail panel for the best practice group.
        Returns:
        The title string.

      • isSelfTest

        public abstract boolean isSelfTest()
        Indicates whether this best practice is a manual test.
        Returns:
        true if best practice is a self test

      • getAboutText

        public abstract java.lang.String getAboutText()
        Returns the detailed About description of the best practice that is displayed in the detail panel for the best practice group.
        Returns:
        The text string that is the About description.

      • getLearnMoreURI

        public abstract java.net.URI getLearnMoreURI()
        Allows a best practice to indicate a link for more detailed information about the best practice. If not null, this URI will be displayed as a "Learn More" link in the detail panel.
        Returns:
        The "Learn More" URI or null if one does not exist.

      • isPass

        public abstract boolean isPass(TraceData.Analysis analysis)
        Returns a value that indicates whether the specified best practices test has passed. This method is not run for a self-test.
        Parameters:
        analysis - The current analysis against which the best practice test is run.
        Returns:
        A boolean value that is "true" if the best practices test has passed, and "false" otherwise.

      • isWarning

        public boolean isWarning(TraceData.Analysis analysis)
        Added for US197546 Text Compression to temporarily handle the 3-status case of Pass, Warning, Fail. Will return false by default, and will be overriden in the BPTextFileCompression class
        Parameters:
        analysis -
        Returns:

      • resultText

        public abstract java.lang.String resultText(TraceData.Analysis analysisData)
        Returns a string containing the results of the best practices test based on the specified analysis data.
        Parameters:
        analysisData - The analysis data from the trace.
        Returns:
        A string containing the test results.

      • performAction

        public abstract void performAction(javax.swing.event.HyperlinkEvent h,
                 ApplicationResourceOptimizer parent)
        This method is used to allow the best practice to do something within the application to maybe display more detail about a failed test. This action will be performed when the user clicks on a hyperlink in the results of a failed test. This method is never called for a self-test.
        Parameters:
        parent - The ARO parent window that is displaying current analysis

      • getExportData

        public abstract java.util.List<BestPracticeExport> getExportData(TraceData.Analysis analysisData)
        Allows the developer to include extra information when a best practice is exported to a file. The analysis export will always export the best practice title and pass/fail/manual. This method allows for extra information to be exported if desired.
        Parameters:
        analysisData - The analysis data from the trace
        Returns:
        A list of items to be included in the export or null if no extra information is necessary.

      • getTestResults

        public abstract javax.swing.JPanel getTestResults()
        Returns results of the test. This can be for example a table of results inside of JPanel.
        Returns:
        Results
